context.note: In this procedure, SpectrumDirectory refers to the folder where you have installed the server.

step.cmd: Stop the server. To stop the server, right-click the icon in the Windows system tray and select Stop Server. Alternatively, you can use the Windows Services control panel and stop the Pitney Bowes service.
Extract the contents of the downloaded zip file to a temporary location.
Copy the gem directory to: SpectrumDirectory\server\modules
In the SpectrumDirectory\server\modules\gem directory, rename the db.ini.sample file to db.ini.

Start the server. To start the server, right-click the icon in the Windows system tray and select Start Server. Alternatively, you can use the Windows Services control panel to start the Pitney Bowes service.
